overview: As Vice President of Product, Pat’s primary role is to ensure EQAL’s proprietary publishing platform constantly evolves to be more powerful, engaging, and social. After studying at UC Berkeley, Pat worked in diverse media industries ranging from television…to print…and finally to the web. He has been in web development for over 11 years as a Visual Designer, User Experience Designer, and Product Strategist. Before coming to EQAL, Pat ran his own interactive agency, Methink Web Studio, providing web application development and user experience consulting. He consulted for companies ranging from startups to Fortune 100companies. He’s been a long term advocate of user centered design, and a perpetual student of understanding how user experience can define brand identity. When not deep in UX wireframes, Pat enjoys photography and industrial design.
